scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development touch .env.development.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.development env-cmd -f .env.development.custom.local react-scripts start
scripts.start:testnet: NODE_ENV=test touch .env.test.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.test env-cmd -f .env.test.custom.local react-scripts start
scripts.start:mainnet: NODE_ENV=production touch .env.production.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.production env-cmd -f .env.production.custom.local react-scripts start
scripts.build:local: NODE_ENV=development touch .env.development.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.development env-cmd -f .env.development.custom.local react-scripts build
scripts.build:testnet: NODE_ENV=test touch .env.test.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.test env-cmd -f .env.test.custom.local react-scripts build
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production touch .env.production.custom.local && env-cmd -f .env.production env-cmd -f .env.production.custom.local react-scripts build
